thread.section_title: Hotel L'Antoine - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Absolutely brilliant
thread.title_full: Absolutely brilliant - Review of Hotel L'Antoine, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: C5504KJsandrah
title: Absolutely brilliant
text:
I spent a weekend the weekend at Hotel L'Antoine with my two nieces and it was absolutely brilliant. The staff were lovely and helpful, the hotel itself is gorgeous, beautifully decorated (we loved the bathroom!) the breakfast was delicious and the location was fantastic. Near to the metro if you needed it and walkable to lots of places. The bars and restaurants surrounding it are great fun and plentiful. I would not hesitate to stay here again infact we are already planning our next visit. Merci Hotel L'Antoine for helping to make such a memorable weekend for us.
Room Tip: We stayed in room for 3 with a double bed and a sofabed. The bathroom was big enough to accommodate... See more room tips
